title: Code::XtremeApps:: (CXA) Hackathon 2018
subtitle: 3rd place
body: Team leader of a 3-person team to develop a web app using React to aid the police in investigating incidents such as terrorist attacks. The app aggregates data from different APIs into a single dashboard and analyses the data using machine learning algorithms in Python.

title: 20th National Olympiad in Informatics (NOI)
subtitle: Bronze medal
body: Achieved a bronze medal in Singaporeâ€™s computing olympiad using C++.

title: Hackathon @ School of Science and Technology
subtitle: 1st place (Open category)
body: Part of a 4-person team to develop a web app using HTML, CSS and JavaScript to connect people with similar interests in communities and coordinate events and activities.

title: RoboCup Singapore Open - RCJ Rescue Line
subtitle: 2nd place (local)
